## snakeCase() function

Converts a string to snake case.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function snakeCase(string: string): string;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

The snake case string

## Example


```ts
snakeCase("fooBar") // "foo_bar"
```
